original_title: Travel and Tourism Fair 2023 at BMICH
original_body_lines: The opening ceremony of the Travel and Tourism Fair 2023 organsied by Sri Lanka Association of Inbound Tour Operations (SLAITO) together with Sri Lanka Tourism was held today at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH) under the patronage of the Prime Minister. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
